title: Circular Economy-Based Collaborative Learning Project: Development of Sustainable Language Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design principles, general understanding of sustainable development, and fundamental knowledge of language structure
context.additional_context: Focuses on language design projects for real-world problem-solving, offering hands-on experience through collaboration with manufacturing enterprises

learning_goals: Learners can integrate core principles of the circular economy into language design projects
Learners can propose sustainable solutions through communication with diverse stakeholders in collaborative learning environments
Learners can creatively develop language-based circular economy models by analyzing real-world corporate cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
